column4: Single cell suspensions were counted using an haemocytometer and adjusted to 1000 cells/uL (mature samples) or 400-800 cells/uL (fetal samples). Cells were loaded according to the standard protocol of the Chromium single cell 3’ kit to capture between 5000-10000 cells/channel. Version 2 chemistry was used.
